ROW.NAME: Accounting System: MasterView
ROW.DESCRIPTION: When entering a new transaction into the Accounting system, MasterView nodes collapse.

ROW.NAME: Web Edition: Data Entry Page
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to enter data into the web edition of the Accounting System.

ROW.NAME: Payables Due Calculator
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to calculate payables due.

ROW.NAME: Web Edition: Search Page
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to search for transactions via the search page. Date parameters are not being passed correctly.

ROW.NAME: Main Menu: Duplicate Items
ROW.DESCRIPTION: There are duplicate items in the main menu.

ROW.NAME: Receivables Calculator
ROW.DESCRIPTION: The system does not correctly sum all receivables due.

ROW.NAME: Ledger: Inconsistency
ROW.DESCRIPTION: There are visual inconsistencies in the Ledger vs. other modules. The wrong grid is being used.

ROW.NAME: Receivables Printing
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to print any receivables due report.

ROW.NAME: Screen Redraw
ROW.DESCRIPTION: There is unnecessary screen redraws - appears as if the application is blinking

ROW.NAME: Email System
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to send Email via Outlook Express.

ROW.NAME: Adding New Vendors Fails
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to add new vendors to the system.

ROW.NAME: History
ROW.DESCRIPTION: We need to track which user modified records in the database and when.

ROW.NAME: Main Menu: Add a File menu
ROW.DESCRIPTION: We need to add a file menu to the main menu. It looks strange without it.

ROW.NAME: Currency Mask
ROW.DESCRIPTION: The currency mask needs to include commas within it.

ROW.NAME: Drag & Drop
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Cannot drag and drop transactions from one account type to another.

ROW.NAME: Data Import
ROW.DESCRIPTION: When importing information from Quicken, all banking information is lost.

ROW.NAME: Reports
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to print receivable reports for last quarter.

ROW.NAME: Data Archiving
ROW.DESCRIPTION: The data archiving function is not working properly - an exception occurs.

ROW.NAME: New Users
ROW.DESCRIPTION: There is a limit of 10 users by default. This should be 50.

ROW.NAME: Email Attachments
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Attaching an invoice to an Email message is not possible.

ROW.NAME: Faxing
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Sending faxes via MS Fax fails.

ROW.NAME: Check Register
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to change bank accounts from the check register.

ROW.NAME: Vendor List
ROW.DESCRIPTION: We must allow users to easily add new fields for a given vendor.

ROW.NAME: Data Export
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Exporting data to QuickBooks fails.

ROW.NAME: Transaction Log
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to export the transaction log to HTML.

ROW.NAME: Transaction History
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to open the transaction history window for any vendors.

ROW.NAME: Help: Phone scripts
ROW.DESCRIPTION: The Phone Scripts form does not have the help file integration.

ROW.NAME: Help File Duplicates
ROW.DESCRIPTION: There are 2 entries for the Ledger in the TOC.

ROW.NAME: Help File Topics
ROW.DESCRIPTION: The following topics are not described: Receivables & Payables Due

ROW.NAME: Help File Integration
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Numerous dialog windows are missing help file topics.

ROW.NAME: Installer
ROW.DESCRIPTION: The Cancel button must be enabled during file copying in order to stop the setup process.

ROW.NAME: Installer
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Cannot install the default database in repair mode.

ROW.NAME: Vendor TAX IDs
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Unable to enter TAX ID for vendors - the mask is wrong.

ROW.NAME: Vendor Name
ROW.DESCRIPTION: The field name for vendors is limited to 25 characters - increase to 75.
